post_message: Brett Morgen's documentary is more than just a must-see for Nirvana fans. It's an eight-years-in-the-making collective labor of love that offers a private peek into the artist's mind, from the first creative stirrings to the spiral downward. You don't just feel as if you've gotten to know the man better. You're left completely emotionally spent.
